name: Multi Score Keeper
description:
This app will help keep track of scores for many types of games. Games such as Phase 10, Five Crowns, Rage, Yahtzee, Qwixx, Sushi Go!, Dutch Blitz, and many other games. No need for pencil and paper or running out of score sheets.

Features include:
- Add any number of players
- Set order of players
- Track current dealer
- Modify user names
- Remember users to be added or deleted from games
- Show requirements for games, such as each phase in Phase 10 and locking rows in Qwixx
- Special scoring, such as bids in Rage, and automatically adding points for making bid
- Show wild card in Five Crowns
- Add or delete points when tracking score
- Save history of games
- Resume games at any time
- Search for specific game by name or players
- Special detailed score sheets for each game

Never run out of score sheets. Use the app to keep score. Save the game results to see how well you did against you friends and family. No more bragging without proof.
